ticket.created: Your ticket is waiting to be claimed by a staff! You will receive a DM/mention when it will be open!
ticket.waiting: You have a ticket waiting to be claimed already! Please wait for the staff to claim it.
ticket.delete: This channel will be deleted in 3 seconds.
ticket.own: You cannot claim your own ticket.
ticket.unclaimingOwn: Only the staff who claim the ticket can unclaim it.
ticket.refusingToCreateStaff: Invalid Reason: You're a staff! You can only make a ticket for a Partnership
ticket.refusingToCreateVerified: Invalid Reason: You've already verified your age
ticket.cantManageChannels: You're missing this permission: Manage Channels
